definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
with back to the mountain and facing the water (favored location)

sentences.english: The result is a public landscape of social functions surrounded by water on all sides.
sentences.chinese: 这样我们创造了一个临水的社会交流空间和公共景观。

sentences.english: Along a five foot source, more than ten residential buildings built in water.
sentences.chinese: 沿着一条五尺源，十余幢民居临水而建。

sentences.english: This project is located at the center area of Rongqiao Peninsula, it is backed by mountains and facing water, the view of broad.
sentences.chinese: 项目处于融侨半岛中心腹地，居山临水，视线开阔。

sentences.english: Listen evening cicada sitting alone near the water, ten years Linhe resistance's hearts.
sentences.chinese: 独听暮蝉临水坐，十年林壑阻归心。

sentences.english: Living in the water, the feeling comfortable cruising.
sentences.chinese: 临水而居，任心情自在游弋。

sentences.english: By water from the Port of Kaohsiung, the approach is spectacular.
sentences.chinese: 从高雄港临水空间走去，其经验是美妙的。

definition: Linjiang county level city in Baishan 白山, Jilin
Linhe district of Bayan Nur city 巴彥淖爾市|巴彦淖尔市[Ba1 yan4 nao4 er3 shi4], Inner Mongolia
Xiao Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
Qüxü county, Tibetan: Chu shur rdzong in Lhasa 拉薩|拉萨[La1 sa4], Tibet
mountains on one side and water on the other
edge of the water/waterside/shore (of sea, lake or river)
patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu/same as 江南水鄉|江南水乡[Jiang1 nan2 shui3 xiang1]
